Hero.h2: AI-Comic-Workshop is a free, open-source comic creation tool that allows you to quickly generate storyboards and comic images by inputting minimal content, making it easy to create professional-quality comic works.

Feature.description1: Input your creative story, and the system will automatically generate a storyboard script based on the content.
Feature.description2: Based on the generated storyboard script, the system will intelligently draw the corresponding comic images.
Feature.description3: Finally, you can export a complete comic poster work.

Pricing.h3: Choose the plan that suits you best
Pricing.description: AI-Comic-Workshop offers both a free version and a professional version to meet different usage needs.
Pricing.doYouLike: What do you think of this tool?
Pricing.follow: Follow our social accounts to learn more.

Testimonial.description1: If you have used AI-Comic-Workshop and shared your work on social media,
Testimonial.description2: please let us know your feedback,
Testimonial.description3: and we will display your valuable comments here.

Faq.description: Here are some common questions and answers about AI-Comic-Workshop.

CTA.h3: Experience AI-Comic-Workshop now and create professional-level comic works!
